Russia bans additional 36 New Zealanders from entering, brings number of banned to nearly 200 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Russia-bans-further-36-new-zealanders-from-entering-brings-number-of-banned-to-nearly-200/ZNEVFR3MYZFOHPLKAFQEONDWTY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Russia-bans-further-36-new-zealanders-from-entering-brings-number-of-banned-to-nearly-200/ZNEVFR3MYZFOHPLKAFQEONDWTY/ David WilliamsThese sanctions come a month after the Government announced more sanctions against Russia. Fri, 28 Jun 2024 19:36:30 +0000 Russia has banned a further 36 New Zealanders from entering the country including journalists, mayors, academics and defence big wigs.
